title: Foreign Language Learning Competency Enhancement Program Based on Mobile Microlearning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic foreign language communication skills and fundamental mobile device operation skills
context.additional_context: Course targeting science professionals, emphasizing improvement of foreign language communication skills linked to workplace environments.

learning_goals: Learners can accurately pronounce and use over 50 science-related technical terms (in a foreign language) through 15-minute microlearning sessions via mobile apps
Through language learning apps, learners can explain scientific experiment procedures in the target foreign language using interactive practice exercises for 30 minutes, 5 times per week
Learners can write and present science report summaries with over 80% accuracy on the Kahoot!-based quiz platform

resources: Foreign Language Vocabulary Database for Science Domains
Mobile Learning Management System (LMS) Access Permissions

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
